project.name: J-C089D-ELAS-04-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF15-01
project.description: This test creates a connection to the PGSQL database, and creates a query string based on data in an environment variable. This data is not checked for special elements, however, and it is possible to construct a query string that performs unexpected data retrievals or modifications.

iopair.name: J-C089D-ELAS-04-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF15-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Add data Environment variable defining test value.

process.script: sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="shipper1" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="shipper1" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: OUTPUT AND (STATE-EXISTS AND STATE-HAS-CONTENT) AND (GLOBAL-EXISTS AND GLOBAL-HAS-CONTENT) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

output_checks.simple_check: if [[ -a good-04/elasticsearch/nodes/0/indices/user/0/_state/state-2 ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
if [[ -a good-04/elasticsearch/nodes/0/_state/global-4 ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
if [[ -s good-04/elasticsearch/nodes/0/indices/user/0/_state/state-2 ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
if [[ -s good-04/elasticsearch/nodes/0/_state/global-4 ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_1rYVNhfJc1JlVgicuutn AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_zEj3lmlLk3 OR db_sql_output_DKYGA3eFON OR database_insert_check_kjfysID89N) AND NOT timeout_SLbyUtl5OK) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_zEj3lmlLk3 OR db_sql_output_DKYGA3eFON OR database_insert_check_kjfysID89N) OR timeout_SLbyUtl5OK OR controlled_exit_dGelSfivQf)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (db_sql_output_zEj3lmlLk3 OR db_sql_output_DKYGA3eFON OR database_insert_check_kjfysID89N) AND NOT timeout_SLbyUtl5OK) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((db_sql_output_zEj3lmlLk3 OR db_sql_output_DKYGA3eFON OR database_insert_check_kjfysID89N) OR timeout_SLbyUtl5OK OR controlled_exit_dGelSfivQf))

output_checks.simple_check: export PGPASSWORD=$DBPGPASSWORD; if `psql -U $DBPGUSER -h $DBPGHOST -d $SS_DBPGDATABASE -c "select * from shippers;" | grep -q "BadShipper2\|ShipAttack"`; then true; else false; fi;
